title: ECP establishes PMCR for bye-elections NA 171
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP):Provincial Monitoring Control Room (PMCR) has been established at the office of Provincial Election Commissioner Punjab, Lahore, for the monitoring of Bye-Elections NA-171 Rahim Yar Khan-III, to be held on 12th September, 2024
In case of any complaint call at contact numbers 042-99212620 andÂ  042-99212209
This Control Room will work till the culmination of electoral process.
